dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-08 BIOME-BGC SSA Simulations of Annual Water and Carbon Fluxes
title: BOREAS RSS-08 BIOME-BGC SSA Simulations of Annual Water and Carbon Fluxes
summary: Derived maps of landcover type and crown and stem biomass as model inputs to determine annual evapotranspiration, gross primary production, autotrophic respiration and net primary productivity within the BOREAS SSA-MSA, at a 30 m spatial resolution.  Mode
